titleInfo.title: F.E. Grant in New York City to O.P. Temple

subject.geographic: The Development of the Industrial United States (1870-1900).

mods.note: Expresses his surprise at the number of recent successful authors who have come from Tennessee. States his misconception of the people and culture of Tennessee. Sends a recent publication by McMaster, which the writer greatly applauds.
The University of Tennessee Libraries (Knoxville, Tennessee) is the digital publisher.

titleInfo.title: Digital Collection: The Growth of Democracy in Tennessee: A Grassroots Approach to Volunteer Voices
